content.raw:
SDF DOM contains wind information (https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/src/eb25f39cfa81ea7d4b0e61cb60de6bb72c64f8f9/include/sdf/World.hh?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#World.hh-86). Would it be better if that information was in a separate DOM object in sdf, instead of bundled in the `World` object?

The reason I'm asking is to hopefully remove the `sdf::Element` pointer from our gazebo code, and rely solely on the DOM.
